thread.title: Unconventionally Unique
thread.title_full: Unconventionally Unique - Review of The High Line Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: shazoom
title: Unconventionally Unique
text: What an amazing suite it was! It was the EXACT room I had admired while studying up on this outstanding hotel--The pink leather club chair was so inviting, and before leaving this morning, I tried my hand at the lovely antique embosser... The coffee bar/ tr√®s unique lobby was special and delicious! From the moment we arrived, to checkout, the experience was so superlative! The gentleman who carried our luggage to our suite, explained everything to us. Less than 24 hours spent at The High Line Hotel and we cannot WAIT to return . . .
